title: Strengthening Management Strategy Practical Competencies: Transformative Learning via Virtual Environment Utilization in Pre-Service Teacher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design science education scenarios using the MUVE platform and implement three or more interactive elements.
Learners perform and document critical reflections on existing educational practices through peer discussions in virtual environments three or more times.
Learners can create portfolios demonstrating the integration of multiple perspectives (instructor/learner/technologist) through project outcomes.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
